sources.title: Croczilla | FULL MOVIE | 2012 | Monster, Action, Horror
sources.description:
A 36-foot crocodile goes on the rampage in Beijing after being moved from a peaceful Crocodile Farm and onto a local gangster's menu.

Directed by Li Sheng Lin 
2012
Starring Tao Guo, Barbie Hsu, and Suet Lam
Croczilla. PG-13.  Action. Comedy. Thriller.

Watch more free movies and TV series at Popcornflix.com, or on the Popcornflix app available on mobile devices, Roku, Xbox, Sony, PlayStation and many more!

metadata.Plot: Xiao, befriends Amao a 36 foot crocodile, who lives on his fathers croc sanctuary. Xiao's father is forced to sell his crocodiles to a gangster who plans to use them for high priced meals. Before Amao is due to be slaughtered, he escapes, slaying his captors in the process. Amongst the chaos, Amao accidentally swallows a bag with $1 million dollars inside. When rumor's of this spread, the town locals are split with some fearing for their lives and others set out to capture and kill the crocodile, at any cost.
metadata.Actors: Barbie Hsu, Tao Guo, Zhaoqi Shi
